[{"id":"e254d0c7-8f5e-4396-a8f3-a9c48467cd49","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: _get_fun_defaults","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2fa25cfd-4c37-40f7-bb58-c70988684fad","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"_get_fun_defaults","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function is a specialized extraction utility used during function and method analysis. Its purpose is to identify and resolve the default values assigned to function parameters (e.g., the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"10","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" in ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"def foo(x=10):","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"). It maps each parameter name to its corresponding resolved value point, ensuring that the analyzer understands the initial state of optional arguments before any explicit calls are made.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"72f4667c-8d3d-4dd0-9215-b0f2d98560a2","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why this matters
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"In Python, default arguments are evaluated only once at the time the function is defined. For static analysis, knowing these defaults is essential for:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"40c8a37c-2df8-4b2b-8421-ca4c3f344fad","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Type Inference:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" If a parameter defaults to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"[]","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the analyzer can infer that the variable is likely a List.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"35f48718-f59a-480d-af30-0e7b2a5c8685","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Call Resolution:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" If a function is called without certain arguments, the analyzer must use these default "value points" to track data flow inside the function body.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"44800ae0-f58d-4eaa-bedc-1570d15d9882","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Accuracy:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" This function distinguishes between standard arguments and "position-only" arguments (available in newer Python versions), ensuring that defaults are mapped to the correct variable names even in complex signatures.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ff3cce91-0f0b-4f92-805a-4598edbefe3a","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How it works","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b73608f8-a090-4be6-84ab-3180a1e751e9","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Offset Calculation:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Since only the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"last","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":" few parameters in a function signature can have defaults, the function calculates a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"start","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" index to align the list of default values with the correct parameter names.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"85c11c6b-fd28-4d47-aa10-51509a5d9054","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Visitation:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It iterates through the defaults, calling ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"self.visit(d)","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" on each to ensure the expression (which could be a function call or another variable) is analyzed.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3770a92b-6744-41b4-9f0f-7dace1d5cf4d","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Resolution:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"c74d0ff1-765a-449d-8ffe-fb2bd1e3c7b0","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It uses ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"decode_node","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to determine what the default expression represents.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6f88ebea-beef-47a6-848c-ecda4e8a985f","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"getYPOint","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to resolve that representation into a concrete list of reachable namespaces or types.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"930ea23f-b5a2-4ab6-83e4-d674b5320bac","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Mapping:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It stores these resolved points in a dictionary where the keys are the argument names (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"{'timeout': ['<int>']}","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d37d1ab9-8cae-4f5a-b37f-27586bc954d4","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Output:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Returns the dictionary of parameter-to-default mappings.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f1a394a8-8e41-46d7-9ee3-526ad629f67f","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example Scenario
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"For the definition: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"def connect(host, port=8080, retry=True):","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ad9510da-9bb9-4ac1-bab6-d2b612748317","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The function sees two defaults: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"8080","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"True","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"81505939-4e47-4396-bed8-c79a10744f4e","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It calculates that these correspond to the 2nd and 3rd arguments.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"aeeab2ac-2e39-415c-bf5f-c908dc2e270c","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It resolves ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"8080","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"<int>","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"True","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to a boolean/constant.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ff03ed59-e7d2-46da-9b31-bdceeb010e23","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It returns: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"{'port': ['<int>'], 'retry': [True]}","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c79da4f2-5285-4ca7-95ac-a7b25ef3c494","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
